description:
Tuntun has an array A of length N. She is interested in finding the number of pair (i,j) such that *1<=i<j<=N* and **Ai XOR Aj** < **Ai&Aj**. 

####Input Format:
*The first line of each test case contains an integer NN, the length of the array A.
*The second line of each test case contains NN space-separated integers.

####Output Format:
*output the number of pairs (i, j) such that **1<=i<j<=N** and **Ai XOR Aj** < **Ai&Aj**. 

####Constraints:
*1<=N<=100000
*1<=arr[i]<=10^9
 
**Sum of N over all test cases does not exceed 300000.
title: XORAND
